##Creating Models

Creating a model class. Param `-m` to create a model with migration classe

```
php artisan make:model <model_name>
```


##Creating Migrations 

Migration exemple

```
public function up()
{
    Schema::create('produtos', function(Blueprint $table)
    {
        $table->increments('id');
        $table->string('nome');
        $table->string('descricao');
        // ...
        $table->timestamps();
    });
}
```
